mrrtf.description: This layer is a topographic index designed to identify high flat areas at a range of scales. Zero values indicate areas that are steep or low, with values 1 and larger indicating progressively larger areas of high flat land.

mrvbf.description: This layer is a topographic index designed to identify areas of deposited material. Zero values indicate erosional terrain with values 1 and larger indicating progressively larger areas of deposition.
